title: What I use to measure device power consumption (and what you should use instead)
description: This is another one of those 'Do as I say, not as I do' moments.

title: Nvidia unveils new kind of Ethernet for AI, Grace Hopper 'Superchip' in full production
description: The Spectrum-X ethernet switch offers "lossless" transmission via a new kind of congestion control, said Nvidia.
